verses.text: VAKAI, ‘oku ou tuku atu ‘eku talafekau ke ne teuteu ‘a e hala ‘i hoku ‘ao: pea ko e ‘Eiki ‘oku mou kumi ki ai te ne ha‘u fakafokifā pe ki hono temipale; ‘io, ‘a e ‘Āngelo ‘o e Kovinānite, ‘a ia ‘oku mou lāulea ki ai: vakai ‘oku hā‘ele mai ia–ko e folofola ia ‘a Sihova Sāpaoti.
Ka ko hai te ne matu‘uaki ‘a e ‘aho ‘o ‘ene hā‘ele mai? pea ko hai te ne matu‘u ‘oka hā mai ia? he ‘oku ne hangē ko e afi ‘o e sivi siliva, pe hangē ko e sopu ‘a e fō kofu.

Pea te ne nofo ko e sivi mo fakama‘a siliva tofu pē, pea te ne fakama‘a ‘a ha‘a Līvai, pea te ne to‘o mei ai ‘a e ‘uli, hangē ko e koula mo e siliva; pea te nau toki hoko ko e kau ‘atu feilaulau kia Sihova ‘i he mā‘oni‘oni.
Pea ‘e toki ifo kia Sihova ‘a e feilaulau ‘a Siuta mo Selusalema, hangē ko e mu‘aki taimi, ‘io, hangē ko e ngaahi ta‘u ‘o ono‘aho.

Pea te u fakaofiofi kiate kimoutolu ke fai ‘a e fakamaau; pea te u hopo vave mo e kau faituki, mo e kau tono ‘unoho, mo e kau fuakava loi; mo kinautolu ‘oku angakovi‘i ‘a e totongi ‘a e ngāue nō, ‘oku nau fakamālohia ‘a e uitou, mo e tamai mate, mo piko‘i ‘a e totonu ‘a e ‘āunofo, ‘o ‘ikai te nau manavahē kiate Au–ko e folofola ia ‘a Sihova Sāpaoti.
He ko Sihova au, ‘oku ‘ikai te u liliu: ko hono ‘uhinga ia ‘o e ‘ikai te mou ‘auha, si‘i hako ‘o Sēkope.

Talu e taimi ‘o ho‘omou ngaahi kui mo ho‘omou afe mei he‘eku ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni, ‘o ‘ikai te mou tauhi ki ai. Foki mai kiate au, pea te u foki kiate kimoutolu–ko e folofola ia ‘a Sihova Sāpaoti. Ka ‘oku mou pehē, Ko ‘emau foki ‘i he hā?
‘E fai kākā ha tangata ki he ‘Otua? ka ko kimoutolu ‘oku mou kākaa‘i au. Pea ‘oku mou pehē, Ko ‘emau kākaa‘i ‘a e ‘Afiona ‘i he hā? ‘I he tukuhau-hongofulu mo e ngaahi me‘a kuo hapai.
Kuo hoko ‘a e mala kiate kimoutolu; ka ‘oku fai ai pē ho‘omou kākaa‘i au, ‘a e pule‘anga kotoa.

Mou ‘omi hono kotoa ‘o e tukuhau-hongofulu ki he fale koloa, ke ai ha me‘a ke maama ‘i hoku fale, pea mou sivi au mu‘a ‘aki ‘a e me‘a ko ia–ko Sihova Sāpaoti ia–pe ‘e ‘ikai te u tangaki ma‘amoutolu ‘a e ngaahi kātupa ‘o e langi, ‘o vakili ‘a e tāpuaki kiate kimoutolu, kae‘oua ke ‘ikai hao.
Pea te u ‘itangi ‘a e tama keina koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu, pea ‘e ‘ikai te ne fakaka‘anga ‘a e fua ‘o homou kelekele, pea ‘e ‘ikai kaulo‘a ho‘omou vaine ‘i he vao–ko e folofola ia ‘a Sihova Sāpaoti–
pea ko e ngaahi pule‘anga kotoa te nau lau kimoutolu ko e monū‘ia: tala atu, te mou hoko ko e fonua māna‘ia–ko Sihova Sāpaoti ia.
Ko ho‘omou lea kiate au ‘oku fefeka–ko Sihova ia. Ka ‘oku mou pehē, Ko e hā ‘emau ngaahi lau ‘oku tau kovi ki he ‘Afiona?
‘Ā, ‘oku mou lau, Ko e ngāue ki he ‘Otua ko e kulanoa: he ko e hā kuo tau ma‘u ‘i he tauhi hono fatongia, mo ‘etau taka hangē ha fai putu ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Sihova Sāpaoti?
Ko hono ‘ātunga ē ko kitautolu ‘oku tau tuku ko e pau‘u ‘oku monū‘ia: ‘io, ko kinautolu ‘oku nofo ke faikovi ‘a ia ‘oku langa hake; ‘io, ko kinautolu ‘oku ala‘aki ki he ‘Otua ‘a ia ‘oku fakahaofi.

Toki fealēlea‘aki ‘a kinautolu na‘e ‘apasia kia Sihova: pea na‘e tokanga ki ai ‘a Sihova, ‘o ne fakafanongo, pea na‘e fai ‘a e tohi fakamanatu ke fe‘ao mo ia, koe‘uhi ko e kakai ‘oku ‘apasia kia Sihova, mo toka‘i hono huafa.

Pea te nau hoko ‘i he ‘aho ‘oku ou kotofa–ko e folofola eni ‘a Sihova Sāpaoti–ko ‘eku koloa kānokato; pea te u ma‘ema‘ekina kinautolu hangē ko e ma‘ema‘ekina ‘e ha tangata hono foha ‘oku ngāue kiate ia.
Pea te mou toe sio ki he fai kehekehe ‘a e mā‘oni‘oni mo e angahala, ‘a e faikehekehe ‘a e taha ‘oku ngāue ki he ‘Otua mo ia ‘oku ‘ikai ke ngāue ki ai.
